articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: OpenAI launches Flex processing for cheaper, slower AI tasks - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI has launched a new API option, Flex processing, for cheaper, slower jobs that leverage its o3 and o4-mini reasoning AI models.
articles.content: In a bid to more aggressively compete with rival AI companies like Google, OpenAI is launching Flex processing, an API option that provides lower AI model usage prices in exchange for slower response… [+1447 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash comes to the Gemini app as Google seeks to improve “dynamic thinking” - Ars Technica
articles.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash is ready for you to try in the Gemini app, but it’s starting as a preview.
